bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a dian xian 癲癇 , peak-illness with epilepsy, which, at the time of its outbreaks, makes the patient’s four limbs twitch, his mouth open wide and his head shake and make horse sounds, as well as tend to arch backwards. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 馬癇之為病，張口搖頭，馬鳴欲反折 , “The disease of horse epilepsy : The mouth is wide open and the head shakes. [Patients] make whickering sounds like horses and tend to arch backwards”.
